purpose: The email is a call for participation in the 6th Summer School on Empirical Research Methods in Software Engineering and Informatics (ERMSEI) scheduled for September 1-5, 2025, in Rennes, France. It aims to help junior researchers start using empirical research methods in software engineering and informatics through practical exercises and case studies. The summer school will cover major research methods and study design, focusing on delivering immediate value to participants.
evidence_sentences: 6th Summer School on Empirical Research Methods in Software Engineering and Informatics (ERMSEI)

The ERMSEI Summer School is the place to go if you are a junior researcher and want to start doing empirical work in a Software Engineering or Informatics context but don't know how or lack a local support system.
The goal of this summer school is to get junior researchers started on using empirical research methods on software engineering topics.
We will cover all major research methods, i.e., controlled experiments, a selection of qualitative methods, and the major approaches to secondary research.
